attributes.action: Bus operators  to install audio announcements at each stop just like on trains
attributes.additional_details:
People with Guide dogs,   and many  other bus passengers  need to know  the name of the stop,   to enable them to get off the bus at the correct stop.

Most train operators (if not all of them)  have already installed such equipment on all their  trains.

Particularly  nowadays when conductors on buses  are a thing of the past.  If  you  are  away from home  in a strange place  you need to  know   when to get off the bus.
Therefore  please encourage  bus operators  to install  audio  equipment  which announces  the location address at each stop or terminus
